channel.title: NPC Talking help

item.title: NPC Talking help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (NPCID == 28) { if(playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = 3093; teleportToY = 3491; sM("Sorry for any Inconvenience."); savemoreinfo(); savechar(); frame99(0); teleblock = false; } else { sM("You cannot leave."); } }

item.title: NPC Talking help
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

ok so im having some trouble with my code, I want a NPC that teleports you to somewhere else but only mod + here is my code

if (NPCID == 28) { teleportToX = 3093; teleportToY = 3491; sm("Sorry for any Inconvenience."); savemoreinfo(); savechar(); frame99(0); teleblock = false; }

if you want to know im adding this so if a staff member gets jailed from some other staff member they can easily talk to the Zoo Keeper to leave but I need it to only work for mod +

Thanks,
James

Read full topic
